multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the main difference between object detection and classification?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Object detection involves drawing bounding boxes around objects, while classification predicts only the presence or absence of objects.
Object detection can only detect a single object in an image, while classification can detect multiple objects.
Object detection is a more difficult problem than classification.
Object detection and classification use different types of neural networks.
